statements: SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_id, project_name, contractor FROM building_permits WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS permit_count FROM building_permits GROUP BY location;
SELECT project_name, permit_date FROM building_permits ORDER BY permit_date DESC;
SELECT contractor, SUM(estimated_cost) AS total_cost FROM building_permits GROUP BY contractor;
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE estimated_cost > 50000 ORDER BY permit_date DESC
SELECT project_name, location, contractor FROM building_permits WHERE location = 'New York' AND contractor LIKE '%Construction%'
SELECT project_name, permit_date, estimated_cost FROM building_permits WHERE contractor = 'ABC Builders' ORDER BY estimated_cost ASC
SELECT project_name, location, contractor, permit_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE location IN ('Los Angeles', 'Chicago')
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_number, project_name, permit_status FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT project_name, estimated_budget FROM construction_projects WHERE estimated_budget > 100000;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE property_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT project_name, permit_type, issue_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'New Construction' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT permit_id, project_name, permit_type, expiration_date FROM building_permits WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, estimated_budget, actual_budget FROM construction_projects WHERE actual_budget > estimated_budget * 1.1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_manager FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_type, permit_date FROM building_permits WHERE building_area > 1000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM construction_projects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT location_id, address, city, state FROM project_location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM building_permits JOIN construction_projects ON building_permits.project_id = construction_projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT project_name, status FROM construction_projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, permit_date FROM building_permits WHERE building_area > 1000;
SELECT project_name, budget, status FROM construction_projects WHERE budget < 50000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, address, city, state FROM construction_projects JOIN project_location ON construction_projects.project_id = project_location.project_id;
SELECT * FROM building_permit;
SELECT permit_id, permit_number, project_name FROM building_permit WHERE issued_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, permit_number FROM building_permit ORDER BY contractor_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, issued_date FROM building_permit WHERE contractor_name = 'ABC Construction';
SELECT project_name, num_floors FROM building JOIN construction_project ON building.project_id = construction_project.project_id ORDER BY num_floors DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permit WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, issued_date FROM building_permit ORDER BY issued_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT contractor_name, project_name, issued_date FROM building_permit WHERE contractor_name LIKE '%Construction%';
SELECT building_id, address, construction_type FROM building WHERE num_floors > 5 ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT contractor_name, license_number, contact_number FROM contractor WHERE address LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY contractor_name;
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE building_type = 'Residential';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE completion_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location, owner_name FROM construction_companies WHERE headquarters_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM project_inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT project_id, invoice_date, amount, payment_status FROM project_invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT permit_id, permit_number, project_id, issue_date, expiration_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_holder = 'ABC Construction Company';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, completion_status FROM construction_projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location, owner_name FROM construction_companies WHERE contact_number = '555-1234';
SELECT project_id, inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM project_inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, invoice_date, amount, payment_status FROM project_invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;
